title: TOPGREENER Kalide Dimmer Light Switch, Pair with 12V Power Supply, 3-Way or Single-Pole, 12/24 V LED Dimmer Switch, TGSDS-1224-W, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #244,508 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #433 in Dimmer Switches       #433 in Dimmer Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: This dimmer light switch is compatible with devices that offer a 12V power supply pack ONLY, such as ambient LED light strips. This slider eliminates the need for a remote to control the mood lighting of LED light strips since a remote can interfere with TVs or other infrared-controlled devices.
Features a user-friendly, easy-to-use slider for full-range dimming and a simple ON/OFF switch at the bottom of the device
Sleek, modern design that is attractive and great for residential and commercial settings.

Made of Polycarbonate Thermoplastic material to provide the durability and resilience needed to withstand hard impacts and heavy force; heat & fade resistance to temperatures over 100° to prevent discoloration; flammability UL94; V2 rating
White color; Input 12V or 24V DC, Output 12V or 24 DC; LED; compatible with dimmable light bulbs only; 3-way or single pole; #16-18 AWG (low-voltage); 1-year warranty; UL listed

customers_say: Customers find the dimmer switch easy to install and consider it good value for money. However, the dimming ability receives negative feedback, with multiple customers reporting that the dimmer does not work properly. Additionally, the quality is poor according to several customers.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
customer_reviews.review_snippet: As dimmers go this is a great deal. The switches feel a little "cheap" but honestly they work great. There is the smallest of buzz you can hear from them but putting them in a commercial location we won't hear it. I will say the instructions are leaking clarity on wiring but easy enough to figure out. You may struggle if you have not installed 3-way switches before.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: No problems wiring and installing this dimmer for my undercabinet kitchen 12v puck lights.  It works but...2 things were not as expected.First, the dimmer does NOT dim from 100%-0% (or even close).  The most it will dim is about 50%.  This is enough for me but be aware.  Second, my dimmer did not have the adjustment wheel as shown in the product picture.  Again, not a problem for me.  But be aware.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2024

customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDimmer does not dim, missing adjustment wheel.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Tried using this for 12v puck lights on a 12v circuit. This switch dims from 12.4v to 11.8v so basically nothing. Not noticeable anyway. Garbage product.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLo mande para una instalación a mi casa en mi país i funciona muy bien
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Lo más importante es el encendido automático i regulador de luz♥️

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I bought two of these hoping the reviews were wrong. They hardly dim the lights. Maybe about 50% but if you are looking for a dimmer that truly gives you low light these are not it.

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsWorked OK but didn't dim enough
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I used this dimmer in my apartment's entrance, with a three-way switch controlling four LED canister lights.The replacement was easy as pie; just make sure you note before you take off the old switch, which is the load and the traveler. The new switch has it clearly marked where each goes.I don't know if it was because the switch controls four lights, but I could not get these to dim as much as I expected. It worked, but the dimming effect was about 1/2 what I expected. I will try this in a spot where only one or two lights are dimmed and see if I get a wider range of dimming.Review of: TOPGREENER Kalide 0-10V Dimmer Light Switch

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Such a great value for the money. Easy to install
